author: YourNameHere
name: SuggestBounties
short: Sync suggestions to GitHub as bounties and track their status with retry capabilities.
description: Links suggestions from ideaboard to GitHub issues as bounties, tracks their status, and provides retry commands for failed bounty creation. Includes comprehensive tracking and manual retry functionality.
install_msg: This cog links suggestions to GitHub issues as bounties, tracks their completion, and provides retry commands for failed bounty creation.
